author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KIKO GRADUALLY WEAKENING OVER COOL WATERS... ...EXPECTED TO PASS NORTH OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS ON TUESDAY AND WEDNESDAY...
summary: ...KIKO GRADUALLY WEAKENING OVER COOL WATERS... ...EXPECTED TO PASS NORTH OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS ON TUESDAY AND WEDNESDAY... As of 5:00 AM HST Sun Sep 07 the center of Kiko was located near 17.6, -144.4 with movement WNW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 965 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 115 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Kiko (CP4/EP112025)
